spec_data.Name: libesmtp-devel
spec_data.Description:
LibESMTP is a library to manage posting (or submission of) electronic
mail using SMTP to a preconfigured Mail Transport Agent (MTA) such as
Exim.

The libesmtp-devel package contains headers and development libraries
necessary for building programs against libesmtp.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 07:46:16 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Headers and development libraries for libESMTP
